item.title: This Startup’s New Humanoid Robot Is Scarily Good at Doing Chores
item.description: Figure just revealed a new humanoid model designed to help in the home or office. Check out the uncanny video.

item.title: Want to Help People Be More Generous, Engaged, and (Oddly Enough) More Resilient? The Science of ‘Thanks in Advance’
item.description: It’s natural to thank someone after the fact, but thanking them beforehand results in a number of positive outcomes.

item.title: Mark Cuban Just Invited Everyone to Deepfake Him on Sora and It’s Really Quite Brilliant
item.description: It fits his longstanding position that everyone should be experimenting with AI tools.

item.title: How an Ice Battery Could Lower Your Electric Bill
item.description: Demand for this technology has grown over the past few years. Here’s how it can slim down your electric bill.

item.title: Trust Is the New KPI: The Strategy Helping Brands Win Over Customers Today
item.description: Brands must stop siloing PR, affiliate, and paid media if they want to build consumer trust that converts.
